title: CreditKarmacom
extract: Credit Karma is an American multinational personal finance company, founded on March 8, 2007, by Kenneth Lin, Ryan Graciano and Nichole Mustard. ... All of Credit Karma's services are free to consumers. Revenue from targeted advertisements for financial products offsets the costs of its free products and services.
